info.description:
deeper golfing of  iapafoto's 2015 "one cube challenge" [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/4d33R8[/url]
( ray-tracing approach of the cube challenge )
info.name: one cube challenge ( 203 chars )

renderpass.code:
// deeper golfing of  https://shadertoy.com/view/4d33R8

#define M length ( max( O-O, abs( vec3(O.xz * mat2(cos(iTime+vec4(0,33,11,0))), O.y)) //
void mainImage(out vec4 o, vec2 U) {
    for( vec3 O = vec3(2,0,7); o.w++ < 99.; o.rgb = O.bbb+3. )
        O -=   vec3( .6* U/iResolution.y -.3, .9 )
             * max( .12 - M -.9)), M -1.)) );
}/*





// --- 206 chars 

#define M length ( max( O-O, abs( vec3(O.xz * mat2(cos(iTime+vec4(0,33,11,0))), O.y)) //
#define mainImage(o,p)                                  \
    for( vec3 O = vec3(2,0,7) ; o.w++ < 99.; )          \
        O += .6 * ( .5 - vec3( p/iResolution.y, 2 ))    \
                *  max( .12 - M -.9)), o.r = M -1.)) ); \
    o = 1.-o.rrrr                                      /*





// --- 210 chars -1 by coyote

#define M length ( max( O-O, abs( O * mat3(c,0,-s,0,1,0,s,0,c) )  //
#define mainImage(o,p)                                \
    float C=iTime, s=sin(C), c=cos(C);                \
    for( vec3 O = vec3(2,0,7) ; o.w++ < 99.; )        \
        O += .6 * ( .5 - vec3( p/iResolution.y, 2 ))  \
                *  max( .12 - M -.9)), C = M -1.)) ); \
    o -= --C                                         /*





// --- 214 chars

#define M(k) length (max( abs(O*mat3(c,0,-s,0,1,0,s,0,c)) -k , 0. )) //
#define mainImage(o,p)                           \
    float C=iTime, s=sin(C), c=cos(C);           \
    for(vec3 O = vec3(2,0,7) ;o.w++<99.; )       \
        O += .6 * (.5-vec3(p/iResolution.y,2))   \
                * max(.12-M(.9),C=M(1.));        \
    o += 1.-C                                   /*

*/
renderpass.name: Image
